!Chuta Kaimu: This is all the wisdom I can share with you. Follow this road to the *Warrior's Grave* at the southwest end. Once there, pray for his soul and you may receive what you require. If necessary, place the Gazkh fragment on the Warrior's Grave. [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 reply_29|Listen to the third verse of the melody in order to confirm.]
